ç„¶ååœ¨é¡¹ç›®çš„vue.config.js å¼•å…¥å¹¶ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

const WorkerPlugin = require("worker-plugin");
// Adds native Web Worker bundling support to Webpack.
module.exports = {
  configureWebpack: {
    plugins: [
      // other plugins
      new WorkerPlugin({
        // use "self" as the global object when receiving hot updates.
        globalObject: "self", // <-- this is the default value
      }),
    ],
  },
};

if (!isDataURI(wasmBinaryFile)) {
  var isPro = process.env.NODE_ENV === "production";
  wasmBinaryFile = isPro
    ? locateFile(wasmBinaryFile)
    : "http://localhost:8082/static/layouter.wasm";
}

module.exports.configureWebpack.optimization = {
  minimize: true,
  minimizer: [
    new TerserPlugin({
      parallel: true,
      terserOptions: {
        output: {
          comments: false, // remove comments
        },
        compress: {
          drop_console: false, // ç”±äºwasmæœ‰æ‰“å°æ—¥å¿—ï¼Œæš‚ä¸å»é™¤console
          drop_debugger: true,
          pure_funcs: ["console.log"],
        },
      },
      extractComments: false,
    }),
  ],
};
